Sentencas: The system Y2O3-Sc2O3-ZrO2 has been extensively studied in the last decade, with the purpose of using it as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: Scandia stabilized zirconia (SSZ) materials have good ionic conductivity, and yttria, when introduced, stabilizes the SSZ against phase transformation.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: As cerium is a large ion, it is expected to stabilize the cubic fluorite phase and enhance the conductivity of the scandia zirconia system.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The electrical properties of system (CexY0.2-xSc0.6)Zr3.2O8-delta were studied, observing how conductivity changes when cerium is introduced and the amount of yttrium is decreased.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: Compositions were produced by an innovative sol-gel combustion method in an attempt to obtain a compositionally homogeneous, dense material.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: This material has the potential to be used as an electrolyte, at intermediate temperatures, for SOFCs.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: Conductivity in the system (CexY0.2-xSC0.6)Zr3.2O8-delta, has been investigated as a function of partial pressure of oxygen down to 10(-24) bars, at 700 degrees C. Samples with Ceria content have better conductivity at higher pO(2) values.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: When they are subjected to lower partial pressures of oxygen, there is a clear drop in the conductivity.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: This drop in the conductivity could be a consequence of the clustering of vacancies, resulting in a decrease of ionic conductivity, as the number of vacancies increases with ceria content.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: For the samples tested in this system, there is no evidence of significant electronic conductivity.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The temperature dependence of conductivity was determined at ambient pressure from 300 to 800 degrees C. From the Arrhenius plot a phase transition is observed to occur between 550 and 600 degrees C. Composition does not have a very significant effect on conductivity values for each temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: At low temperatures, the dominant contribution to conductivity is due to the poor grain boundary conductivity.
Titulo: Investigation of conductivity of (CexY0.2-x)Sc0.6Zr3.2O8-δ (0<x<0.2) system and its dependence upon oxygen partial pressure
